name: The Pact (thepact)
description:
You are a peasant living in a kingdom ruled by a lord. There is a tradition that the lord chooses several people to sacrifice as an offering for the gods to fertilize the land. This year, your family is selected, and they are slaughtered on the altar with people’s cheers. When you are desperate, and about to be killed too, a voice whispers in your ears.

The voice reveals the truth to you that the lord kills people to use their souls to build an astral world for himself instead of praying for the fertile land. With the power of the astral world, his soul can be immortal. The voice offers you a pact. Your family is just killed, and their souls are not gone yet. It will give you the power to enter the astral world and save your family’s souls. In return, you must help it destroy the Astral world.

However, is this the truth of everything? Will the voice keep its promise? What will you find at the end of your journey?

Wait for our upcoming build, we would that build to be playtested at GDC.

It will be uploaded around 03/15/23
